Uses of Interface
stincmale.ratmex.meter.WaitStrategy

  • Packages that use WaitStrategy 
    Package Description
    stincmale.ratmex.meter
    Contains tools for rate measuring.

    • Uses of WaitStrategy in stincmale.ratmex.meter

      Classes in stincmale.ratmex.meter that implement WaitStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ParkWaitStrategy
      This implementation of WaitStrategy combines exponential backoff and parking.
      class  YieldWaitStrategy
      This implementation of WaitStrategy just spins calling Thread.yield() between tests of a condition.
      Fields in stincmale.ratmex.meter with type parameters of type WaitStrategy

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.function.Supplier<? extends WaitStrategy> ConcurrentRateMeterConfig.getWaitStrategySupplier​()
      Specifies which WaitStrategy must be used by a thread-safe implementation RateMeter (if it at all uses it).
